item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-07-04
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Oishii Sushi Bar (612 Hammond Street, Boylston St/Rt.9, Chestnut Hill). #
  • Oishii Sushi for my birthday #
  • I'm at Starbucks (1154 Boylston St, Hammond St, Chestnut Hill). #
  • I'm at Kickass Cupcakes (180 Linden St, Everrett St, Wellesley). #
  • RT: Use Facebook Markup Language to add actually useful features to your business's Facebok fan page. (via @zeldman) #
  • I'm at Starbucks (1154 Boylston St, Hammond St, Chestnut Hill). #
  • I'm at Finagle A Bagel (Chestnut Hill) (1240 Boylston Street, Chestnut Hill). #
